title: The Foolishness Of The Gospel | Unapologetic #66
itunes:title: The Foolishness Of The Gospel | Unapologetic #66
description: When was the last time someone told you that "being nuts was a mark of a Christ-follower?" Feels borderline insane, right? I mean, who wants to be called a "nutcase"? But before you click off this video, hang with us on this episode of Unapologetic.
